MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G1 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Great Dove hill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:54pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:00pm on 3rd February 2021.
